name: Spike hunter
description:
The game is about a square that has to avoid the circles and spikes to get to the target. But then the game changes and he is no longer allowed to touch the goal. He became a spike hunter.

How many spikes can you destroy?!

You only need your mouse to move the square ;-)

You have to play it in full screen mode, otherwise you won't be able to see the user interface properly. I apologise for that.
